TEXT:
A swordwielding spellcaster who rapidly casts magical spells to gain mana, which can then be used to unleash devastating melee combos.
Known for having potent enfeebling magic.
NL You grip your rapier, and channel magic into your focus...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~wanderer,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
